scripts.setup: npm install && npm --prefix ./backend install && npm --prefix ./frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm --prefix ./backend run dev" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev"
scripts.start:proc: npm run build:frontend && npm --prefix ./backend run start:proc
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run check:bundle-size && npm run perf:lighthouse
scripts.test:e2e: if [ "${SKIP_WEB_TESTS:-true}" = "true" ]; then echo "Skipping E2E (SKIP_WEB_TESTS)"; exit 0; fi; playwright test
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run build
